general_advisory: Farmers should monitor paddy field for seedling blight, Blast and Sheath blight diseases. Blast infestation has been observed in some places to control spray Tebuconazole 50% + Trifloxystrobin 25% WG@ 0.4 g or Isoprothiolane 40EC @ 1.5 ml per litre of water. Light rain is expected in the coming week.

advisory: Go for early sowing/transplanting as for as possible to complete these by mid-August. Go for medium duration rice varieties in medium land. Go for line sowing of rice followed by early beaushaning and weeding. This will avoid the rainfall required for transplanting, and over-aged seedlings if transplanted late.
Stalk borer infestation observed in some places in sweet corn crop to control spray ememectin benzoate 10 gm in 15 lt of water.
Blight infestation has been observed in some places to control spray carbendazim 30 gm+ hexaconazole 30 ml in 15 lt of water. Postpone spray operation in coming week.

Vaccination should be given with tablet for worms. Provide calcium, magnesium and salts along with fodder crops to the animals in these days. Cattle shed along with feed container should be kept dry and clean as it lead to fungal infection.
